name: Raspberry Video
short_description:
An operating system for high-speed video playback on your Raspberry Pi B and B+ (not compatible with the R-Pi 2). For home and digital signage purposes.

When running, just insert an USB key with videos inside (actual files or informations pointing to remote images) and boot: the system will display them in a restricted full-screen mode.

See http://www.binaryemotions.com/raspberry-video for complete instructions.

NOTE

If you need an operating system designed for *web* digital signage on your Raspberry, please see: http://www.binaryemotions.com/raspberry-digital-signage instead. It partially plays also videos.
